captions.text:
revisit the film that reminds you that no
matter how much you love each other
you’re both gonna grow old and die.

From sappy author Nicholas Sparks, comes the
timeless romance that paved the way for millions

of people to form unrealistic expectations
of their real-life relationships.

Meet Allie, an attractive, wealthy, Southern
Belle who’s biggest problem is that everyone

Meet Noah, a poor country boy who’s entire
family is dead.

When these two find each other, he’ll criticize
her for being a pushover, and then constantly
And she’ll abandon him on numerous occasions.

Together they’ll be so indecisive, you’ll
wonder why they’re even trying.
"I need you to tell him that I love him."
"If you leave here, I hate you."

A love. that taught an entire generation of
women, that it's perfectly okay to string

along a sweet, handsome, supportive guy, as
long as you’re able to satisfy your

A movie so generic, yet inexplicably popular,
it’s basically the Olive Garden of Love

And a romance that will make nagging girlfriends
ask “Why aren’t you more like Ryan Gosling?”

Prompting all boyfriends to ask: “Can we
please watch Die Hard?
Prepare to relive the bad driving,
The Movie Your Girlfriend Will Make You Watch

So wait, he wrote hundreds of letters, but
couldn’t just call her once?
Ugh could have saved me 2 hours.

Be sure to subscribe and be sure to tell us
in the comments below what movie you want

And tell me what words you'd like to hear
me say in my epic movie trailer voice.

comments.text:
This movie is so boring and incredibly superficial. Yes, it's touching how 
they stayed together so long and died together (I guess), but their story 
is so nauseating. That chick was a huge bitch who is completely 
untrustworthy and basically can't make up her damn mind. Yes, I'm a woman 
who doesn't think too highly of this chick flick. Chick flicks usually bug 
me anyway and I never see them unless there's nothing else on TV. Then 
again I'm a tomboy, so maybe my low estrogen levels don't allow me to enjoy 
movies based around relationship drama.﻿
